column4: Why is my text I enter in a text field in Firefox underlined red (misspelled)?
probably need to install some dictionaries in firefox - they come as .xpi files, so you can just install them from mozilla's pages
Dictionaries? Hmm...how come I have to do that? I didn't have to do that for any other Firefox I installed on my other machines.
not sure, perhaps localisation settings are slightly different on the machine you're on.
